name: MusicNStuff
description:
• This is a mobile(Android so far ) rhythm game similar to Friday Night Funkin, 
  • All Sound, Music are my production :) as well the characters are based on the original FNF game , *except for some songs(the ones with no number as  a title) used for testing purposes yet to be removed*

 6 Months ago i challenged myself to make a clone of Friday Night Funkin all by myself and here i am, Please feel free to test the game its still a prototype all credit for the original idea goes to FRIDAY NIGHT FUNKIN and NEWGROUNDS
